author: wn.com
title: Agency Updates—Curbing Testing Excesses, Debating Superintendent Certification Standards (Texas American Federation of Teachers)
text: ( Source : Texas American Federation of Teachers ) Texas Education Agency : Commissioner of Education Michael Williams announced today a move toward partial compliance with HB 743 by Rep. Dan Huberty (R-Humble), a key bill passed last session
